turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Centurion (tank).
turn.1: What happened to the Centurion when it was hit by a missile?
turn.2: Examination after detonation found that it had been pushed away from the blast point by about , pushed slightly left and that its engine had stopped working, but only because it had run out of fuel.
turn.3: What else was damaged on the tank?
turn.4: Antennae were missing, lights and periscopes were heavily sandblasted, the cloth mantlet cover was incinerated, and the armoured side plates had been blown off and carried up to from the tank.
turn.6: It could still be driven from the site.
turn.7: What else was interesting about this article?
turn.8: Had the tank been manned, the crew would most likely have been killed by the shock wave.
turn.9: Was another Centurion created after this one was destroyed?
turn.10: 169041, subsequently nicknamed "The Atomic Tank", was used in the Vietnam War.
turn.12: In May 1969, during a firefight, 169041 (call sign 24C) was hit by a rocket-propelled grenade (RPG).
